description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Are YOU a GENIUS? Experience a world of exotic trivia! Play with classic to present questions in this thrilling interactive challenge. Get rewarded on every correct answer, and score more than your friends to win. Here's your chance to prove once and for all, how smart you really are!
